Title: Tastes Like A Ho Ho
Plot: Katie is getting ready for her upcoming deposition in the Frobisher case while Gregory withholds information that could be even more important that Katie's.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Steven Gilborn, Michael Gaston, Robin Thomas, Kevin Isola, Carmen Goodine, Mackenzie Connolly, Jeremy Shamos
